main event: Two civilian guards at the Anniston Ordnance Depot in Bynum, Alabama spotted an unusual aerial light in the night sky.
interesting points: The object was described as a stationary, round, silver to amber-colored light that was larger than a grapefruit.
The object displayed unusual movements, including up and down and circular motions.
The object was visible for about 7 minutes before disappearing to the southwest.
This was the second such sighting of an unusual aerial object in the area within the past month.
The weather conditions were overcast, but the object was still clearly visible.
sighted object: a round, silver to amber-colored light larger than a grapefruit
